      • createFaction

        public Faction createFaction(java.lang.String factionName,
                             java.lang.String tag,
                             java.lang.String password,
                             java.util.UUID ownerId)
        Creates a Faction with given parameters, along with a new FactionMember, if one for the owner does not exist.
        Parameters:
        factionName - The String name of the Faction.
        tag - The String tag of the Faction.
        password - The administrator String password of the Faction.
        ownerId - The Unique ID of the Player that is set to as the owner of the Faction.
        Returns:
        The new Faction.

      • deleteFaction

        public void deleteFaction(Faction faction)
        Removes a Faction from the database, and removes FactionMembers from the Faction.
        Parameters:
        faction - The Faction being deleted.

      • validateFactionTag

        public Response validateFactionTag(java.lang.String tag)
        Parameters:
        tag - The String Faction tag being validated.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response that is never null. If the validation is a success, response.getResult() should return Result.SUCCESS.

      • setFactionTag

        public void setFactionTag(Faction faction,
                          java.lang.String tagNew)
        Properly assigns a new String tag for a Faction.
        Parameters:
        faction - The Faction being re-tagged.
        tagNew - The String tag to set for the Faction.

      • validateFactionName

        public Response validateFactionName(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - The String Faction name being validated.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response that is never null. If the validation is a success, response.getResult() should return Result.SUCCESS.

      • validatePlayerFactionCreate

        public Response validatePlayerFactionCreate(Player player)
        Returns whether or not the Player is valid to create a Faction
        Parameters:
        player - The Player being validated.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response based on the results of the tests. If all tests pass, Result.SUCCESS is passed to the Response.

      • playerOwnsFaction

        public boolean playerOwnsFaction(java.util.UUID playerId)
        Parameters:
        playerId - The Unique ID of the Player being checked.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the Player being checked owns a Faction.

      • createFactionMember

        public FactionMember createFactionMember(Player player,
                                         Faction faction)
        Creates a FactionMember container for the given Player, and adds this to the Faction provided.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player being given a representing FactionMember container.
        faction - The Faction the result FactionMember is being assigned to.
        Returns:
        A FactionMember container for the given Player.

        Parameters:
        playerId - The Unique ID of the Player.
        faction - The Faction the result FactionMember is being assigned to.
        Returns:
        A FactionMember container for the given Player.

      • getFactionByTag

        public Faction getFactionByTag(java.lang.String tag)
        Parameters:
        tag - The String tag of the Faction.
        Returns:
        Returns a Faction if one exists using the tag provided. Returns null if no Faction uses the tag provided.

      • getFactionMember

        public FactionMember getFactionMember(java.util.UUID playerId)
        Parameters:
        playerId - The Unique ID of the Player.
        Returns:
        Returns a FactionMember. Returns null if the Player is not a member of a Faction.

      • getFactionMember

        public FactionMember getFactionMember(Player player)
        Parameters:
        player - The Player being looked up.
        Returns:
        Returns a FactionMember with a given Player. Returns null if the Player is not a member of a Faction.

        public Faction getFaction(java.util.UUID factionId)
        Parameters:
        factionId - The Unique ID of the Faction.
        Returns:
        Returns the Faction. If there is none, null is returned.

      • tagExists

        public boolean tagExists(java.lang.String tag)
        Parameters:
        tag - The String tag of the Faction.
        Returns:
        Returns true if a Faction is currently using the provided tag. (The tag is forced upper-case on the check. All Faction tags are upper-case).

      • getInvitesForPlayer

        public java.util.List<FactionInvite> getInvitesForPlayer(java.util.UUID playerId)
        Parameters:
        playerId - The Unique ID of the Player.
        Returns:
        A LinkedList of FactionInvites for a Player. If the Player has no invites, the list will return empty.

      • getFactionInvite

        public FactionInvite getFactionInvite(Player player,
                                      Faction faction)
        Returns a FactionInvite for a given Player from the given Faction.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player being invited to the Faction.
        faction - The Faction inviting the Player.
        Returns:
        Returns a FactionInvite if a invite exists for the Player from the Faction. Returns null if a invite does not exist.

      • acceptInvite

        Parameters:
        factionInvite - The FactionInvite being accepted.
        Returns:
        Returns a Response. If the accept is successful, the Result included will be SUCCESS.

        Creates and registers a FactionInvite.
        Parameters:
        factionOwner - The Faction being invited to.
        playerIdOwner - The Unique ID of the Player inviting.
